resources.string: This app provides a brief overview of the Protein Sparing Modified Fast (PSMF) diet and a calculator for you to determine your protein goal.

The idea behind a PSMF is to eat as few calories as possible while consuming enough protein to preserve lean body mass and getting enough micronutrients from supplementation to avoid any deficiencies. This means your calories will be almost exclusively from lean protein sources with very few calories coming from carbs or fats.

In the end this is still a \'crash\' diet and the amount of time you stay on it should be limited. The calculator will give recommendations based on your current stats. As always, before starting any new diet, please first consult with your primary health care physician.
